alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Craig; Delaware; Mayes; McIntosh; Muskogee; Ottawa; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 11:51PM CST until February 27 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Western Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Southern Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Eastern Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 1230 AM CST. * At 1150 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near White Oak to 3 miles north of Peggs to 3 miles southwest of Keefeton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Muskogee... Bentonville... Tahlequah... Siloam Springs... Miami... Vinita... Stilwell... Jay... Bella Vista... Grove... Prairie Grove... Fort Gibson... Gentry... Tontitown... Gravette... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Decatur... Warner... This includes the following highways, Interstate 44 between mile markers 270 and 324. Interstate 49 between mile markers 89 and 93. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern, northeastern and east central Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Cherokee; Craig; Delaware; Mayes; McIntosh; Muskogee; Ottawa; Sequoyah
